entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
